医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明口服索马鲁肽 50 毫克有望治疗成人肥胖：《柳叶刀》报告研究人员进行了一项 III 期随机临床试验 (RCT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-reveals-oral-Semaglutide-50-mg-as-promising-treatment-for-obesity-in-adults-the-Lancet-report.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-reveals-oral-Semaglutide-50-mg-as-promising-treatment-for-obesity-in-adults-the-Lancet-report.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd4d41d6-672c-4755-b54f-9df92128cc4d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 04:09:00 -0400 Study reveals oral Semaglutide 50 mg as promising treatment for obesity in adults: the Lancet report
研究表明 A 型血可能直接影响 SARS-CoV-2 感染风险研究人员评估了 A 型血与 SARS-CoV-2 感染之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-suggests-blood-group-A-may-directly-influence-SARS-CoV-2-infectious-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Study-suggests-blood-group-A-may-directly-influence-SARS-CoV-2-infectious-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b419aee0-f7b0-450d-9d4b-fb20b2628054 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 04:05:00 -0400 Study suggests blood group A may directly influence SARS-CoV-2 infectious risk
了解 SARS-CoV-2 持续存在对儿童的生物学影响研究人员分析了有关严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 的最新知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Understanding-the-biological-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-persistence-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Understanding-the-biological-effects-of-SARS-CoV-2-persistence-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39d071b8-e9e6-432a-944f-37f989600064 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 03:33:00 -0400 Understanding the biological effects of SARS-CoV-2 persistence in children
Albumedix 与 Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult 签订合作协议先进疗法的推动者和重组人白蛋白 (rAlb) 的全球领导者 Albumedix Ltd. 今天宣布，他们已与 Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult (CGT Catapult) 签订合作协议，以研究 Albamedix 专有白蛋白的用途用于先进治疗应用的解决方案，包括病毒载体制造。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Albumedix-enters-into-collaboration-agreement-with-Cell-and-Gene-Therapy-Catapult.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Albumedix-enters-into-collaboration-agreement-with-Cell-and-Gene-Therapy-Catapult.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf265d32-fd9e-4771-899e-849cc1d35942 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 01:20:00 -0400 Albumedix enters into collaboration agreement with Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult
Albumedix 和 Valneva 扩大合作范围，纳入新批准的灭活 COVID-19 疫苗Albumedix Ltd. 是重组人白蛋白 (rHA) 领域公认的全球领导者，专注于先进疗法和生物制药的实现，今天宣布扩大与 Valneva SE 的现有合作，Valneva SE 是一家专注于预防传染病的特种疫苗公司，具有显着的疗效。未满足的医疗需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Albumedix-and-Valneva-expand-collaboration-to-include-newly-approved-inactivated-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Albumedix-and-Valneva-expand-collaboration-to-include-newly-approved-inactivated-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfdba003-dbd8-4e94-aca2-4e4c78675d54 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 01:11:00 -0400 Albumedix and Valneva expand collaboration to include newly approved inactivated COVID-19 vaccine
瓦赫宁根大学的研究人员赢得 Green CellDrop 赠品DeNovix Inc. 很高兴地宣布 Green CellDrop 自动细胞计数器赠品的获奖者：来自荷兰瓦赫宁根大学的 Michiel Schrijen！ CellDrop 是从世界各地科学家的数千份参赛作品中随机选出的，将存放在该大学的生物系统学小组中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Researcher-from-Wageningen-University-wins-Green-CellDrop-Giveaway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Researcher-from-Wageningen-University-wins-Green-CellDrop-Giveaway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f73095ce-a5e1-46b0-b0a3-df0b20b470d1 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 00:57:00 -0400 Researcher from Wageningen University wins Green CellDrop Giveaway
大流行性瘫痪：研究揭示了解决方案，COVID-19 阻止了被忽视的热带疾病运动在最近发表在《PLoS 被忽视的热带疾病》杂志上的一项研究中，研究人员评估了严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 大流行对大规模药物管理 (MDA) 规划的影响。他们还为被忽视的热带病 (NTD) 利益相关者提供了重新启动 MDA 实施活动的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Pandemic-parathesis-COVID-19-halts-neglected-tropical-disease-campaigns-study-reveals-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Pandemic-parathesis-COVID-19-halts-neglected-tropical-disease-campaigns-study-reveals-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f749d5-59fd-4b3f-9337-86a887e8777d Wed, 28 Jun 2023 23:46:00 -0400 Pandemic paralysis: COVID-19 halts neglected tropical disease campaigns, study reveals solutions
剑桥心理学家开发新测试来衡量一个人对错误信息的敏感性剑桥大学心理学家开发了第一个经过验证的“错误信息敏感性测试”：一个两分钟的快速测验，可以可靠地表明一个人是否容易被网络空间中充斥的捏造新闻所欺骗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Cambridge-psychologies-develop-new-test-to-measure-a-persone28099s-susceptibility-to-misinformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Cambridge-psychologies-develop-new-test-to-measure-a-persone28099s-susceptibility-to-misinformation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c87ae6d7-7e8c-40d4-a4e8-8e583e9e4b3f Wed, 28 Jun 2023 23:20:00 -0400 Cambridge psychologists develop new test to measure a person’s susceptibility to misinformation
CognoSpeak：人工智能工具利用语音技术快速评估痴呆症风险谢菲尔德大学的研究人员开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以帮助医生更快、更有效地评估痴呆症和阿尔茨海默氏症的早期症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/CognoSpeak-AI-tool-uses-speech-technology-to-quickly-assess-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/CognoSpeak-AI-tool-uses-speech-technology-to-quickly-assess-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a45dc2-0e04-4721-968b-60ae63e50468 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 23:11:00 -0400 CognoSpeak: AI tool uses speech technology to quickly assess dementia risk
维生素 D 补充剂可降低老年人心脏病发作的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项临床试验发现，维生素 D 补充剂可以降低 60 岁以上人群发生心脏病等重大心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0acfd166-a7c3-43a2-8003-4c6d9e780027 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 23:09:16 -0400 Vitamin D supplements may reduce risk of heart attacks in older adults
